channel.title: Subliminal 718 - Economy/PK | VPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/banner one.png[/img]
I would like any type of feedback so leave a comment if you wish!
Today's changes ~ 11-Feb 2013 New squeal of fortune system & rewards Added Construction into the server Check the 'Skilling' teleport.
Today's changes ~ 10-Feb 2013 Added a NPC which allows donators to reset their combat skills!
Today's Changes ~ 7-Feb 2013 Brand New donator zone finished today Zombies minigame added today Various small adjustments made to server Added Extra donators benefits
Upgraded to a much better VPS - No more lag spikes or dc's ~ 6-Feb 2013 Quad Core - 3GB Ram - Plenty of processing power
4 New features added today. ~ 5-Feb 2013 Extreme Donators do not take damage from Overloads! Flower Planting implemented! Purchase Mithril Seeds via Donate options New Crystal Chest method! Better rewards and rare reward calculation Automatic Double XP Weekend EVERY weekend!
Brand new Unique home area finished today~ 4-Feb 2013
Homepage: [url=http://www.subliminalrs.com]Subliminal - Free RuneScape Private Server[/url]
Forums: [url=http://www.forum.subliminalrs.com]Subliminal Forums[/url]
Thank you for looking at our server, below are most of our features listed. There are many more in game to see, so go ahead and log on.
***Brand New Home Area*** *VPS Hosted* *Auto-Donation* *Perfect Switching* *Good Combat* *Donator Pets* Construction now available as a skill Zombies Minigame Flower Game Gambling Automatic Double XP Weekend EVERY weekend! Korasi Sword Dragon Claws Squeal Of Fortune Loyalty Point Shop PK Point Shop Exclusive Donator Zone Money Pouch Bandos Saradomin Tormented Demons Duel Arena Gnome Agility Course Dominion Towers Barrows Fight Pits Corp Beast Zamorak Armadyl Castle Wars Kalphite Queen Fight Caves Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon Free For All PK Zone - Dangerous and Safe Edgeville PK - Most Popular! Revenants PK Mage Bank PK Glacors Jadkino Lair Kuradals Dungeon Polypore Dungeon - Includes own Polypore shop Slayer Tower
Fantastic Video showing the new home area and Soggy Bread's opinion of the server, WITH COMMENTARY [youtube]http://youtu.be/kqNftEJ8v38[/youtube] From us at Subliminal - Thank you for the video
Zombies Minigame start NPC [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/zombiestart.png[/img] In-Game Zombies Minigame [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/zombiesin.png[/img] New Donator Zone entrance [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/donatorzone1.png[/img] Donator Theiving stalls, Magic and Yew trees - New Donator Zone [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/donatorzone2.png[/img] Mith, Iron, Addy and Rune ore with furnace, anvil and a cooking range - New Donator Zone [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/donatorzone3.png[/img] All Altars in one area - New Donator Zone [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/donatorzone4.png[/img] ***New Unique Home*** [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/newhome.png[/img] Fully Coded Nex [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/nex.png[/img] Polypore Dungeon [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/polyporedungeon.png[/img] Glacors [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/glacors.png[/img] Armadyl [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/armadyl.png[/img] Barrows [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/barrows.png[/img] Castle Wars [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/castlewars.png[/img] Corp Beast [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/corp.png[/img] Dominion Tower [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/dominiontower.png[/img] Duel Arena [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/duelarena.png[/img] Free For All - Safe or Dangerous Portals (White - Safe, Red - Dangerous) [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/ffasafeordangerous.png[/img] Free For All PK Zone [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/ffazone.png[/img] Fight Caves [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/fightcaves.png[/img] Fight Kiln [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/fightkiln.png[/img] Fight Pits [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/fightpits.png[/img] Gnome Agility [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/gnomeagility.png[/img] Tormented Demons - Including Prayers [IMG]http://subliminalrs.com/images/tormenteddemons.png[/img]
We wish to see you in game.
For website version of features please go to [url=http://www.subliminalrs.com/features.html]http://www.subliminalrs.com/features.html[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.description:
@Forskin wrote:

[CENTER]

I would like any type of feedback so leave a comment if you wish!

Today’s changes ~ 11-Feb 2013
New squeal of fortune system & rewards
Added Construction into the server
Check the ‘Skilling’ teleport.

Today’s changes ~ 10-Feb 2013

Today’s Changes ~ 7-Feb 2013

Zombies minigame added today
Various small adjustments made to server
Added Extra donators benefits

Upgraded to a much better VPS - No more lag spikes or dc’s ~ 6-Feb 2013
Quad Core - 3GB Ram - Plenty of processing power

4 New features added today. ~ 5-Feb 2013
Extreme Donators do not take damage from Overloads!
Flower Planting implemented! Purchase Mithril Seeds via Donate options
New Crystal Chest method! Better rewards and rare reward calculation
Automatic Double XP Weekend EVERY weekend!

Brand new Unique home area finished today~ 4-Feb 2013
